strike the cue ball.</size></outline>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Score more with Trick Shots!</size></outline>




<size=56>Use a ball to pocket another ball




Pocket more than one ball




Pocket a ball using a rail
</size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Pocket balls to score points.</size></outline>
<size=48><color=#2d222d>Pocketing Score =
Ball Number * Pocket Multiplier

For example, if you pocket the ball 9
 in a "x10" pocket, you will score 90 pts.</c></size>






<size=45>You get bonus points for the hearts 
you have when the game completes.

You lose hearts when you fail to pocket a ball. </size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60></size></outline><size=48><color=#2d222d>You get a No Bust! bonus
 when the game completes with no heart lost.</c></size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=50>You get bonus points for finishing early.</size></outline>


<size=50>Time bonus calculation:</size>

<size=60><color=#404d84>
Shots Total                            
Trick Shots                           
Time Bonus                           
</c></size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Let's take a moment to learn
some controls before you start.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Drag to move the cue.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Drag the power meter and release to shoot.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Slider up and down to fine-tune the angle.</size></outline>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Score more points with trick shots.
Use the ball 9 to pocket the ball 12.</size></outline>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>You've mastered the basics.
Let's start a practice game to
learn more.</size></outline>
Pocket a ball using a rail
